alert.note: Alert for Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:01AM PST until February 23 at 6:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a trace up to 2 inches along with winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Morongo Basin including Morongo Valley, Yucca Valley, Joshua Tree, and Landers. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Accumulating snowfall on roads such as SR 62, 247, and county roads south of SR 62. This could result in hazardous travel conditions and increased accidents.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
